text: Fruits 4-5 a day 1 medium fruit 1/4 cup dried fruit 1/2 cup fresh, frozen, or canned fruit Vegetables 4-5aday 1 cup raw leafy vegetable 1/2 cup cooked vegetable Low-fat or non-fat dairy 2-4 aday 250 mL milk foods 1 cup yogurt 50 g cheese Grains and grain products = 6-8 a day 1 slice bread (include at least 3 whole- 1 cup cereal grain foods each day) 1/2 cup cooked rice or pasta Lean meats, poultry and 2 or fewer a day 90 g cooked lean meat, fish skinless poultry or fish Nuts, seeds and legumes ~ 4-5 per week 1/3 cup nuts 1 tablespoon seeds 1/2 cup cooked dry beans Fats and oils 2-3 aday 1 teaspoon margarine 1 tablespoon low-fat mayonnaise 2 tablespoons light salad dressing 1 teaspoon vegetable oil Sweets 5 or fewer per week 1 tablespoon sugar 1 tablespoon jam 15 g jelly beans 250 mL lemonade
